channel.title: Delaware on MicroModa
channel.description: Recent content in Delaware on MicroModa

item.title: Delaware State University
item.description: Founded in 1891, Delaware State University is an accredited, HBCU school that welcomes all students. We offer 52 undergraduate degrees and 26 graduate degrees.

item.title: University of Delaware
item.description: The University of Delaware, which traces its origins to 1743, offers over 100 academic majors; its distinguished faculty includes internationally known scientists, authors and teachers.

item.title: Wilmington University
item.description: Wilmington University is a private, non-sectarian university that offers both undergraduate and graduate-level degree programs thoughout Delaware, New Jersey and Online in a variety of career areas.
